i1.name: Whisper
description: {{sbc|Innate - Death In 4 Acts:}} '''Jhin's''' [[basic attack]]s consume [[ammunition]] within 4 rounds. He will {{tt|reload|Jhin is unable to declare basic attacks during this time.}} over {{fd|2.5}} seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being [[out of combat]] and not being affected by {{tip|crowd control}}. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.

'''Jhin's''' final round attack has an {{tip|uncancellable windup}} versus champions, always {{tip|critically strike|critically strikes}} its target, including {{tip|turrets|structures}}, and also deals {{as|{{pp|key=%|15 to 25 for 3|1 to 11}} of the target's {{sti|'''missing''' health}}}} as {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} to non-structures.

{{sbc|Innate - Every Moment Matters:}} '''Jhin''' gains {{as|{{pp|key=%|4;5;6;7;8;9;10;11;12;14;16;20;24;28;32;36;40;44|formula = 3% + 1% per level up to 9, then + 2% up to 11, then + 4% up to 18}}|attack damage}}{{ft|{{as|(+ {{fd|0.3}}% per 1% critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.25}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}}|{{as|(+ 30% of his critical strike chance)}} {{as|(+ 25% of his '''bonus''' attack speed)}}}} {{as|AD}} as {{sti|ad|{{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
Additionally, {{tip|critical strikes}} grant '''Jhin''' {{as|10%|movement speed}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.4}}% per 1% '''bonus''' attack speed)}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate - Death In 4 Acts: Jhin's basic attacks consume ammunition within 4 rounds. He will reload over 2.5 seconds immediately after expending all rounds or withholding leftover rounds after 10 seconds of being out of combat and not being affected by crowd control. The latter reload can be interrupted by declaring an attack or casting an ability.
Jhin's final round attack has an uncancellable windup versus champions, always critically strikes its target, including structures, and also deals 1 to 11 ‒ undefined of the target's missing health as bonus physical damage to non-structures.
Innate - Every Moment Matters: Jhin gains 4;5;6;7;8;9;10;11;12;14;16;20;24;28;32;36;40;44% − undefined% (based on level) AD as bonus attack damage.
Additionally, critical strikes grant Jhin 10% (+ 0.4% per 1% bonus attack speed) bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
i1.notes:
* The penalty to '''Jhin's''' {{as|critical damage}} also reduces the base damage ((100 + 75){{times}}0.86 rather than 100 + (75{{times}}0.86) and stacks with other sources (i.e {{ii|Infinity Edge}}) ((100 + 75 + 35){{times}}0.86).
** This penalty does not affect {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.
* The {{as|{{sti|'''missing''' health}}}} damage benefits from {{sti|life steal}}.
* The 4th attack cannot be canceled by '''Jhin''' himself.
* The 4th attack versus a structure is classified as a critical strike.
* The attack damage multiplier stacks additively with {{bi|Dragon Slayer|Dragon Slayer's}}.
* ''Every Moment Matters' '' bonus {{as|AD}} will benefit from any amount of {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}, even in excess of an amount that would usually reach the attacks per second cap ({{fd|2.5}}).
** The maximum modifier without attack speed is 74%.
*** 44% base modifier at level 18.
*** 30% from critical strike chance on account of the 100% cap.
*** [[Attack speed#Reducing attack speed|Attack speed slows]] will not affect '''Jhin's''' bonus attack damage from his passive and will ignore his attack speed as it is fixed.
* Attack damage reductions apply before the multiplier causing them to be stronger against '''Jhin''' than advertised or versus other champions.

q1.name: Dancing_Grenade
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' throws a grenade at the target enemy that can bounce to up to three additional nearby enemies, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to each target.
The damage is increased by 35% of the '''base''' damage if the enemy the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jhin throws a grenade at the target enemy that can bounce to up to three additional nearby enemies, dealing physical damage to each target.
The damage is increased by 35% of the base damage if the enemy the grenade last bounced off of dies shortly after being hit.
q1.notes:
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will not prevent the canister from bouncing.
{{Unit-targeted cancel conditions}}

• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ % AD) (+ 60% AP)

w1.name: Deadly_Flourish
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} Enemy {{tip|champions}} that trigger a ''{{ai|Captive Audience|Jhin|Lotus Trap}}'' to bloom or are [[damage]]d by '''Jhin''' or allied champions are ''marked'' for 4 seconds.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' fires a shot in the target direction that deals {{as|physical damage}} to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, reduced by 25% against {{tip|minions}}.
Hitting a ''marked'' champion {{tip|root|roots}} them for a duration and grants '''Jhin''' {{ais|Whisper|Jhin|Every Moment Matters}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed|ms}}}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Enemy champions that trigger a Jhin's Lotus Trap to bloom or are damaged by Jhin or allied champions are marked for 4 seconds.
Active: Jhin fires a shot in the target direction that deals physical damage to all enemies in a line until colliding with an enemy champion, reduced by 25% against minions.
Hitting a marked champion roots them for a duration and grants Jhin Jhin's Whisper bonus movement speed.
leveling: {{st|Physical Damage|{{ap|60 to 200}} {{as|(+ 50% AD)}}|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|60*0.75 to 200*0.75}} {{as|(+ {{fd|37.5}}% AD)}}}}
w1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to the enemy champion and {{tip|area damage}} to all other enemy units.
* The ''Caught Out'' mark only appears if ''Deadly Flourish'' can potentially {{tip|root}} the target, and will not if the ability's cooldown is longer than 4 seconds or isn't ranked up.
{{Effect at cast time start}}
* ''Deadly Flourish'' is blocked by {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} but not {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}}.
** ''Deadly Flourish'' is special cased to be intercepted by the former because it looks like a blockable missile, even though it isn't functionally a missile.

effects.str:
• Physical Damage: (+ 50% AD)
  • Non-Champion Damage: (+ 37.5% AD)

e1.name: Captive_Audience
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Jhin''' periodically [[stock]]s a ''Lotus Trap'' charge, up to a maximum of 2.
{{sbc|Passive - Beauty in Death:}} Whenever '''Jhin''' [[kill]]s an enemy champion, he summons a ''Blooming Lotus Trap'' on their corpse.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' places a ''Lotus Trap'' at the target location which, upon landing, becomes {{tip|stealthed trap|stealthed}} after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting {{tip|sight}} within its radius. The ''Lotus Trap blooms'' upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming {{tip|standard sight|revealed}} for 4 seconds.

''Blooming Lotus Traps'' {{tip|slow}} enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before exploding, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies. ''Lotus Traps'' deal 65% damage against {{tip|minions}} as well as {{tip|champions}} who have been struck by another ''Lotus Trap'' in the last 1 second.
''See [[Jhin/LoL#Pets|Pets]] for more details about Lotus Traps.''
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Jhin periodically stocks a Lotus Trap charge, up to a maximum of 2.
Passive - Beauty in Death: Whenever Jhin kills an enemy champion, he summons a Blooming Lotus Trap on their corpse.
Active: Jhin places a Lotus Trap at the target location which, upon landing, becomes stealthed after arming over 1 second, lasting for up to 180 seconds and granting sight within its radius. The Lotus Trap blooms upon enemy contact, with enemies in the area at the time of its trigger becoming revealed for 4 seconds.
Blooming Lotus Traps slow enemies within the area by 35% for 2 seconds before exploding, dealing magic damage to enemies. Lotus Traps deal 65% damage against minions as well as champions who have been struck by another Lotus Trap in the last 1 second.
See Jhin/LoL#Pets for more details about Lotus Traps.
e1.notes:
* ''Beauty in Death'' does not consume ''Lotus Trap'' charges.
* The ''Lotus Trap'' will stop upon encountering a {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} or {{ai|Unbreakable|Braum}}.
* ''Beauty in Death'' does not trigger after killing a {{tip|clone}}.
* The reveal debuff is named [[File: Caught Out.png|20px|link=]] ''Caught Out''.
** This debuff is shared between ''Captive Audience'' and {{ai|Curtain Call|Jhin}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 120% AD) (+ 100% AP)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ 78% AD) (+ 65% AP)

r1.name: Curtain_Call
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jhin''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for up to 10 seconds, transforming his weapon into a powerful cannon. He gains the ability to recast ''Curtain Call'' up to 4 times within its duration.

{{sbc|Recast:}} After {{fd|0.25}} seconds, '''Jhin''' fires a round in the target direction that grants {{tip|sight}} around its trajectory for {{fd|0.5}} seconds and deals {{as|physical damage}} to enemies hit, which is increased by {{as|{{pp|type=target's '''missing''' health|key=%|key1=%|0 to 300 for 11|0 to 100|formula=3% per 1% of target's '''missing''' health.}}}}. It will stop upon hitting an enemy {{tip|champion}}, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 80% for {{fd|0.5}} seconds and {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for 2 seconds. Each cast has a {{tt|static cooldown|Unaffected by ability haste}} of 1 second.
The fourth shot {{tip|critical strike|critically strikes}} for {{as|{{critical damage|100}} '''bonus''' physical damage}}.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Jhin channels for up to 10 seconds, transforming his weapon into a powerful cannon. He gains the ability to recast Curtain Call up to 4 times within its duration.
Recast: After 0.25 seconds, Jhin fires a round in the target direction that grants sight around its trajectory for 0.5 seconds and deals physical damage to enemies hit, which is increased by 0 to 100 ‒ undefined. It will stop upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing them by 80% for 0.5 seconds and revealing them for 2 seconds. Each cast has a static cooldown of 1 second.
The fourth shot critically strikes for (+ IE 25%) bonus physical damage.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Damage|{{ap|50 to 200}} {{as|(+ 25% AD)}}|Maximum Damage|{{ap|50*4 to 200*4}} {{as|(+ 100% AD)}}}}
r1.notes:
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} to enemy champions and {{tip|area damage}} to other enemy units.
*Each cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Curtain Call's'' shooting range is fixed in front of '''Jhin'''.
* The opening sound effect and area of range are audible and visible to both teams.
* Leveling up the ability while channeling will change the final cooldown.
* '''Jhin''' will turn to face in the target direction whenever he uses a recast.
* '''Jhin''' gains a wider field of view during ''Curtain Call''.
* The reveal debuff is named [[File: Caught Out.png|20px|link=]] ''Caught Out''.
** This debuff is shared between {{ai|Captive Audience|Jhin}} and ''Curtain Call''.
{{Effect at cast time end}}
